title: CONSTANT FRIEND REQUESTS FROM BOTS?
body:
FIRST AND FOREMOST, I AM SORRY FOR THE ALL CAPS. I HAVEN'T BEEN ABLE TO FIND MY CAPS LOCK FOR A FEW MONTHS.

I RECEIVE FRIEND REQUESTS FROM BOTS CONSTANTLY. IF I CLICK "ADD", THE BOT SENDS ME SOME ADVERTISEMENT FOR SOME ELO BOOSTING OR OTHER NONSENSE. RIOTS NEEDS TO DO SOMETHING ABOUT THIS. I'M SICK OF THE SPAM.

replies.body: I get about 1 a day at least. I decline all friends. Which really builds irony with my namesake.
To turn your caps off just open the onscreen keyboard from the start menu and press caps. Simple.

> [{quoted}](name=LostxProphet,realm=NA,application-id=cIfEodbz,discussion-id=kf57Nusb,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2015-03-25T12:05:00.842+0000)
>
> To turn your caps off just open the onscreen keyboard from the start menu and press caps. Simple.

WHERE'S THE START MENU?

> [{quoted}](name=CANTFINDCAPSLOCK,realm=NA,application-id=cIfEodbz,discussion-id=kf57Nusb,comment-id=00010000,timestamp=2015-03-26T00:58:59.290+0000)
>
> WHERE'S THE START MENU?

just click the windows button bottom left corner --> search -->  type "On screen keyboard" should pop up

I've had this happen once, more frustrating was it seems to immediately un-friend you after sending the spam. I had intended on sending a report to support about it, but couldn't remember the name or find it in the friends list, offline list included.

I get one random friend request literally every day for, i can't remember how long.
Not sure who or what they are, but i've auto denied every single one since i don't recall
them in any previous matches i've played.
yea the bot requests are really annoying
Bots ads started when I linked my account to lolking, even when i unlinked it's still going.
